resources.string:
Coronavirus COVID-19 Tracker 

By Andrew Wood 

This project demonstrates an Android app that uses Kotlin, MVVM, data binding, Retrofit, Glide, navigation layouts, bottom sheet, overflow menu, Bitmap sharing, Google Maps, and using a 3rd-party library for pie charts. It does not use Room or the Repository pattern yet. 

The source code can be viewed at https://bitbucket.org/awood82/covid19tracker/src/master/ 

Thank you to Google for providing the excellent "Developing Android Apps with Kotlin" course for free on Udacity. 

Thank you to Phil Jay for his MPAndroidChart library (licensed under Apache 2.0).
